scripts.load-test:get-api-version:local: artillery run --config config/common.yml -e localhost -o report/index.json scenarios/get-api-version.yml
scripts.load-test:get-api-version:review-app: artillery run --config config/common.yml -e review-app -o report/index.json scenarios/get-api-version.yml
scripts.load-test:get-profile:local: artillery run --config config/common.yml -e localhost  -o report/index.json scenarios/get-profile.yml
scripts.load-test:get-profile:review-app: artillery run --config config/common.yml -e review-app -o report/index.json scenarios/get-profile.yml
scripts.load-test:get-profile-external-idp: artillery run --config config/common.yml -e no-target  -o report/index.json scenarios/get-profile-external-IDP.yml
scripts.load-test:signup-placement:localhost: artillery run --config config/common.yml -e localhost  -o report/index.json scenarios/signup-and-placement.yml
scripts.generate-dataset: npm run db:initialize && npm run actually-generate-dataset
